overview:
Daniel Walker is co-founder and Chief Operating Officer of eMerge Health Solutions. In his role as eMerge COO, Mr. Walker has developed successful relationships with partners, customers and investors. Mr. Walker has provided strategic operating leadership for the success of eMerge.

Over his 24 year healthcare career, Mr. Walker has been instrumental in the development of numerous successful businesses. Mr. Walker co-founded one of the first free standing outpatient endoscopy center in the United States which was sold to a national company within the first 3 years. He serves on the American Society for Gastrointestinal Endoscopy Practice Management Committee and was a founding officer of Gastroenterology Administration Assembly of Medical Group Managers Association.
